short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a warning when you are about to visit a URL that contains basic auth credentials, to help prevent phishing attacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays a warning when you are about to visit a URL that contains basic auth credentials, to help prevent phishing attacks. 

Clicking on a link to a URL like example.com@something.zip would take you to a website with the domain something.zip, which may not be what you expect, and may allow an attacker to conduct a phishing attack by imitating example.com. This extension should display a warning when this is happening, and may help prevent that. Of course, it is not a guarantee, and you are still responsible for your own security.
